text: The Hyundai Sonata is a car produced by Hyundai since 1985. The Sonata has been widely exported to many countries. ==Gallery== File:SONATA 1st Front.JPG|First generation File:'88-'89 Hyundai Sonata GLS (Front).jpg|Second generation File:93-94 Hyundai Sonata.jpg|Third generation File:3rd-Hyundai- Sonata.JPG|Fourth generation File:06-2007 Hyundai Sonata.jpg|Fifth generation File:2011 Hyundai Sonata SE 2 -- 06-20-2010.jpg|Sixth generation File:Hyundai Sonata P4250857.jpg|Seventh generation File:2020 Hyundai Sonata SEL (Quartz White), front right.jpg|Eighth generation == References == Sonata Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Hyundai Sonata
